data.title: Modiv Announces 2024 Financial Results Release Date
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Modiv ( (MDV) ) has issued an update.

On February 4, 2025, Modiv Industrial, Inc. announced it will release its fourth quarter and full-year financial results for 2024 on March 4, 2025. The company also disclosed its estimated net asset value (NAV) per share as of December 31, 2024, which is $24.11. Modiv engaged Cushman & Wakefield, an independent valuation firm, for the appraisal of its real estate assets. This valuation will inform stakeholders about the fair value of the company’s assets, though it is worth noting that NAV calculations are not based on GAAP and are subject to significant professional judgment. The announcement does not impact the company’s obligation to update this information in future disclosures.

More about Modiv

Modiv Industrial, Inc. is an internally managed real estate investment trust (REIT) focused exclusively on acquiring single-tenant net-lease industrial manufacturing properties. The company targets critical industrial manufacturing properties with long-term leases to tenants that support the national economy and enhance supply chain efficiency.

YTD Price Performance: 0.74%

Average Trading Volume: 37,006

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell

Current Market Cap: $143.6M

Unum Group ( (UNM) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Unum Group reported strong financial results for the fourth quarter of 2024, with net income of $348.7 million, reflecting an increase from the previous year. The company demonstrated robust growth across its core operations, with a solid balance sheet and liquidity, as well as a positive outlook for 2025, anticipating continued premium and earnings growth.

data.title: Voya Financial Reports Strong 2024 Results and Acquisition
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest update is out from Voya Financial ( (VOYA) ).

Voya Financial reported strong financial results for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024, with notable growth in Wealth Solutions and Investment Management offset by higher loss ratios in Health Solutions. The company returned $800 million in capital to shareholders and completed the acquisition of OneAmerica Financial’s retirement plan business, which is expected to enhance its industry positioning. Despite challenges in Health Solutions, Voya expects improved profitability in 2025 through core business growth and strategic acquisitions.

More about Voya Financial

Voya Financial, Inc. operates in the financial services industry, primarily offering wealth solutions, investment management, and health solutions. The company focuses on delivering exceptional outcomes for customers and creating long-term value for shareholders, with a significant presence in the retirement plan sector following its recent acquisition of OneAmerica Financial’s retirement plan business.

data.title: Carnegie Clean Energy Announces Board Leadership Transition
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Carnegie Clean Energy Ltd ( (AU:CCE) ) has shared an announcement.

Carnegie Clean Energy Ltd announced changes to its Board of Directors, with Non-Executive Director Anthony Shields stepping up as the new Non-Executive Chairman following the retirement of Terry Stinson. Under Stinson’s leadership, Carnegie progressed as a leader in ocean energy technologies, and Shields aims to continue this trajectory, focusing on technical and commercial strategies and exploring new opportunities in the expanding ocean energy market. The transition is expected to maintain strong governance and strategic direction, as the company continues its projects in Spain and Tasmania and seeks new funding and project sites worldwide.

More about Carnegie Clean Energy Ltd

Carnegie Clean Energy Ltd (ASX: CCE) is an Australian technology developer focused on delivering ocean energy technologies for a more sustainable world. The company owns and develops CETO® and MoorPower® technologies, which harness energy from ocean waves to produce electricity efficiently using advanced AI and electric machines. With a global presence through subsidiaries in Ireland and Spain, Carnegie is recognized for its pioneering developments in the ocean energy sector.

data.title: FMR Resources Advances Copper Exploration with New Drilling Initiatives
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Applyflow Limited ( (AU:FMR) ) has shared an announcement.

FMR Resources Limited, operating in the mining industry, announced the final results of its airborne VLF-EM survey and inversion modeling at the Fairfield Copper Project in New Brunswick, Canada. This survey helped refine the conductive targets at its Demoiselle site, aligning them with existing geochemical and geological data. The company plans to begin a maiden drilling program at Demoiselle and Demoiselle South in February 2025, marking the first drilling activity in this area in nearly 30 years. These developments highlight the project’s potential for significant copper mineralization and could impact the company’s operations and industry positioning by providing valuable information for future exploration efforts.

More about Applyflow Limited

data.title: Air Products Names New CEO Eduardo Menezes
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Air Products and Chemicals ( (APD) ) has issued an announcement.

On February 4, 2025, Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. announced the appointment of Eduardo F. Menezes as the new Chief Executive Officer, effective February 7, 2025, succeeding Seifi Ghasemi after more than a decade of service. Menezes, who has extensive experience in the industrial gases sector, will also join the board of directors along with Wayne T. Smith as Chairman and Dennis H. Reilley as Vice Chairman. This leadership transition is expected to leverage Menezes’ global expertise to enhance the company’s value and drive future growth.

More about Air Products and Chemicals

Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. is a leading global industrial gases company with over 80 years of experience, focusing on energy, environmental, and emerging markets to promote a cleaner future. The company supplies essential industrial gases, equipment, and expertise across various industries, including refining, chemicals, metals, electronics, manufacturing, medical, and food. As a major hydrogen supplier, Air Products is involved in clean hydrogen projects and offers products like turbomachinery and cryogenic containers globally. With fiscal 2024 sales of $12.1 billion and operations in about 50 countries, it has a market capitalization exceeding $65 billion.

YTD Price Performance: 17.28%

data.title: mF International Secures Nasdaq Extension for Bid Price Compliance
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An update from mF International Limited ( (MFI) ) is now available.

On February 4, 2025, mF International Limited announced that it received an additional 180-day extension from Nasdaq to meet the $1.00 minimum bid price requirement for its continued listing on the exchange. This extension follows a previous non-compliance notice given in August 2024, after which the company failed to regain compliance by the initial deadline of January 28, 2025. The company now has until July 28, 2025, to achieve compliance. mF International plans to monitor its stock price and explore options to meet this requirement, although the extension does not currently impact its business operations or financial reporting obligations.

More about mF International Limited

mF International Limited is a British Virgin Islands holding company with three operating subsidiaries in Hong Kong. The principal subsidiary, m-FINANCE Limited, is a seasoned financial trading solutions provider that specializes in developing and offering financial trading solutions via internet or SaaS platforms. With approximately 20 years of expertise, m-FINANCE services brokers and institutional clients across mainland China, Hong Kong, and Southeast Asia, offering solutions like the mF4 Trading Platform, liquidity solutions, and social trading apps.

data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Cypherpunk Holdings Inc ( (TSE:HODL) ) has provided an update.

Sol Strategies Inc. has announced the granting of 400,000 stock options to its directors and consultants, exercisable at $4.91 per share over five years, effective January 31, 2025. This move reflects the company’s commitment to incentivize its leadership and align their interests with shareholders as it continues to focus on the Solana blockchain, potentially impacting its operations by bolstering its position within the decentralized finance sector.

More about Cypherpunk Holdings Inc

Sol Strategies is a publicly traded Canadian holding company focused on the development of the Solana blockchain and ecosystem through investments in private equity and financial markets. The company aims to leverage opportunities in staking rewards and Solana-based projects, providing shareholders with indirect participation in decentralized finance. Sol Strategies is listed on the Canadian Securities Exchange under the ticker HODL and on the OTC market under the ticker CYFRF, with headquarters in Toronto, Canada.

data.title: Nevada Canyon Gold Enters Agreement for Lapon Canyon Exploration
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Nevada Canyon Gold ( (NGLD) ) has issued an announcement.

On February 3, 2025, Nevada Canyon Gold Corp. announced an Exploration Stream Earn-in Agreement with Walker River Resources, LLC to explore and develop the Lapon Canyon Gold Project in Nevada. The agreement allows Nevada Canyon to earn up to a 50% interest in the project by investing $5 million in exploration over three years, aiming to enhance their royalty portfolio and leverage gold prices.

More about Nevada Canyon Gold

Nevada Canyon Gold Corp. is a US-based natural resource company headquartered in Reno, Nevada. It focuses on mineral royalty creation and acquisition, precious-metals and exploration streaming, and exploration project acceleration. The company has strategic land positions and royalties in multiple projects in Nevada’s historical mining districts, known for high-grade mineral deposits.
